description: Defines a vintage-styled search bar widget named AppSearchBar for a Flutter mobile app, with custom styling, rounded appearance, and embedded text input and button.

classes.name: AppSearchBar
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a vintage-styled, rounded search bar with an embedded text input and action button.

methods.name: _pillDecoration
methods.description: Returns a BoxDecoration with a rounded pill shape, inner embossed shadow, and outline border, used for styling the main container of the search bar.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the AppSearchBar, including the input field and submit button.
